jx.jx_en_mean: To exhibit or show off one's strength.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 显示或炫耀（某人的）力量

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin flex- 'bent', from the verb flectere

encyclopedia.content: flex通常是指Adobe Flex，是最初由Macromedia公司在2004年3月发布的，基于其专有的Macromedia Flash平台，它是涵盖了支持RIA（Rich Internet Applications）的开发和部署的一系列技术组合。flex的另一个意思是一款生成扫描器的工具，能够识别文本中的词法模式。

entry.def: A flex is an electric cable containing two or more wires that is connected to an electrical appliance.

entry.tran: 活动，屈伸(肌肉或身体某一部分)
entry.def: If you flex your muscles or parts of your body, you bend, move, or stretch them for a short time in order to exercise them.

example.ex: He slowly flexed his muscles and tried to stand.
example.tran: 他缓慢地活动了一下肌肉，想尽量站起来。

sentences.sentence: "he gave his biceps a flex to impress the ladies"

means.word_mean: 5. cause (a plastic object) to assume a crooked or angular form;

sentences.sentence: "the strong man could turn an iron bar"

auth_sentence.content: At some point, ASEAN could flex its muscles.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 柔韧的,易弯曲的,灵活的,能变形的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flex弯曲+ible能……的→adj.柔韧的,易弯曲的,灵活的,能变形的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 僵硬的,不灵活的;坚定的,固执的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+flexible[adj.柔韧的,易弯曲的,灵活的,能变形的]→adj.僵硬的,不灵活的;坚定的,固执的
de离开+flex弯曲→离开[偏离]弯曲→偏斜
in向内+flex弯曲→v.弯曲; 内曲

abbreviation.mean_cn: 屈曲, 能屈的, 屈曲，曲, 屈肌

means.word_mean: (为准备大干而)显示实力；摩拳擦掌

sentences.en: He’s flexing his muscles, waiting for the day he becomes president.
sentences.cn: 他在摩拳擦掌，等着成为总统的那一天。
